scenes.background: Bob shifts uncomfortably, Monica looks concerned.
scenes.description: Is this really the best way to handle things? Im worried about the precedent it sets.

options.text: Let's focus on the task first and discuss policies later.
options.analysis: You prioritize the immediate task while postponing policy discussions, showing good self-regulation and social skills, though empathy and perception could be stronger.

options.text: I understand your concern, Bob. We can set clearer boundaries next time.
options.analysis: You acknowledge Bob's concern and agree to set boundaries in the future, showing good perception and empathy but could improve on self-regulation and social skills.

options.text: I appreciate your worry, but we need to address this now.
options.analysis: You acknowledge Bob's concern but emphasize the urgency of the task, showing good social skills but lower in motivation and self-regulation.
